article_text: The six remaining Republican presidential candidates take the stage Saturday in Greenville, South Carolina, for their first debate since the New Hampshire primary. Follow along below for commentary, opinions and analysis from U.S. News.

article_metadata.title: Live 9th Republican Presidential Debate 2/13/16

article_summary:
The six remaining Republican presidential candidates take the stage Saturday in Greenville, South Carolina, for their first debate since the New Hampshire primary.
Follow along below for commentary, opinions and analysis from U.S. News.
